name: Skyfall: My Adventure
description:
• Incarnate as a warrior and explore the vast galaxy.

• A variety of planets and continents are waiting for you to unlock.

• Create your own home through fighting, mining, handicrafts, logging,
excavation, smelting and construction.

• You can't stop fighting for resources in the ancient battlefield.

• Defeat the star shark and challenge the law of extreme survival

• Cooperate with friends to create a blue whale country.

• Fight to the end with evil enemies in the whale forest and become a real star warrior.

There are all kinds of Lords and bosses hidden in the deep sky waiting for you to fight. Let the sky fall，We will stand tall and become the most dazzling hero.
